title: Undervegas Card
content:
[[iftags +fragment]]
> This is a structural template component for the flipcards on the Undervegas hub; the CSS for the cards is contained there, this is just so that adding a new card means writing small include instead of 30 lines of syntax.
[[/iftags]]

[[div class="flip-card"]]
[[div class="flip-card-inner"]]
[[div class="flip-card-front"]]
[[div class="cardtext"]]
+* {$scp}
+++* {$title}
dealt by {$author}
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="flip-card-back" style="{$styling}"]]
[[div class="cardtext"]]
[[module ListPages fullname="{$url}"]]
++++++* [[[{$url} | {$quote}]]]

[[span class="votes"]]+%%rating%%[[/span]] / [[span class="comments"]]üó®Ô∏è %%comments%%[[/span]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
author: Rounderhouse
